text: I m Not Sure if I can do this AnymoreHey everyone  recently my life has been an emotional roller coaster  Currently  I m a junior at my local university and I ve been feeling overwhelmed with the amount of academic work that I have to complete  Last week  I had to assist with putting down one of my sister s pets which was one of the most difficult nights that I had to live through  As for my university  I m beginning to lose interest in working at the campus radio station because I don t feel happy working there anymore  Furthermore  I m also feeling overwhelmed working as the social media director for Active Minds at my local university  Ever since then  I ve been having thoughts of ending my life  but not to the point where I want to do it  The explanation of why I don t want to leave is because I still see some purpose in my life As for my mental health  I see a counselor at my college weekly  While it s great to check in with her  I m not too sure if I m making any progress in improving my mental health  I have some friends here on campus and they do care about me  but I don t want to feel like a burden to them  As for my relatives  I m too scared of telling them what s going on because they may pull me out  Up until now  each day for me gets harder and harder to go through because I routinely think that I am stuck in a rot and I m never going to escape I honestly don t know what to do anymore and I don t want to leave  I want to complete my junior and senior years of college and continue on in my life with my friends and family  I want to be able to live a successful life and I feel as though I am losing my grip on reality  If there is anybody out there that can help me  I would greatly appreciate it  I don t want to leave

text: How to help a long distance suicidal friend I have a friend who lives about   miles away from me  I don t have her exact address  but she has talked about suicide for about a year now but it seems as if she has a plan and is getting ready to actually do it   She has seen therapists with no results and gets angry when I tell her to call the suicide prevention hotline  I don t know her exact timeline but she has told me that she has been saying her goodbyes so it seems as if it s going to be soon   We communicate over text and email  so I don t really have a way to get her location but I need to help  or at least know that I did everything I could   Any advice  I know things have been difficult for her lately and I ve always done my best to give her my support  But I m out of ideas on what to do now
summary: A long distance friend of mine has talked about suicide for about a year and is getting ready to do it. She has seen therapists with no results and gets angry when I tell her to call the suicide prevention hotline. She's been saying her goodbyes and she lives miles away.

text: Difficulty coping with being a physically non desirable man Sort of bought into the narrative that looks weren t all that important for a man  Pretty ridiculous looking back how I never experienced intimacy with a girl before the age of    and that was with a very low self esteem girl and ended badly    Always thought my personality was to blame  Sort of kept the wheel turning like an idiot  have a masters degree in physics  did enjoy my time in physics though  went into medicine after that which in hindsight was a stupid decision but I thought it was something I wanted to do at the time  Now a radiologist in training  I m in a comfy space financially  have a vivid social life  not a lot of close friends though  I do organise sport events  cycling  and other stuff and try building my leadership qualities  I feel bit of satisfaction from time to time  but it s very few and far in between  I m also getting a bit more female attention now even though I ve never been intimate with a second girl  While a intimate relationship is what I desire  ultimately a loving partner I can care and provide for and be cared for by  I don t feel very good about this  I have almost  years of experience that women are not attracted to me so I can only assume these people want to use me  I ve experienced this many times now  only after finding out about my accomplishments  what I work and where I live they warm up to me  I cannot trust them  I know this doesn t sound too terrible but I don t know how to cope with the fact that I jumped through all those hoops to have a shot at getting laid just a space holder it s not about sex  with someone who ll use and discard me  while better looking people can just experience  true love    I feel like it s a no win situation and I feel incredibly inferior  The only thing keeping me alive right now are my parents for I don t want to hurt the only people who truly love me and a few friends
summary: After his masters degree in physics, he went into medicine. Now he's a radiologist in training. He's in a comfy space financially and has a vivid social life. He organises sport events cycling and other stuff and tries to build his leadership qualities. He has never been intimate with a girl before. He doesn't want to hurt his parents.
cleaned: masters degree physics go medicine radiologist training comfy space financially vivid social life organise sport event cycling stuff try build leadership quality intimate girl not want hurt parent

text: No  you dont need friends  Stop lying to yourself  A lot of people think that you need to socialize to be healthy  but Im starting to think thats a myth  First of all  you cant trust them  Trust is stupid and you should always be skeptikal of someone  there is a chance they want to hurt you  When youre isolated  you dont have that risk  Having close friends is also dangerous  If you have a friend you tell a lot of stuff too  or even a girlfriend  there is a high chance they will use anything you say to them about yourself to bully you later in life  No one cares about you and you shouldnt care about anyone
summary: No, you don't need to socialize to be healthy. You can't trust your friends and having close friends is dangerous. No one cares about you, so you shouldn't care about anyone.   If you have a friend you tell a lot of stuff to, there is a high chance they will use anything you say to bully you later in life.

text: It ll be okay Hey friends  I know it s really hard right now  I know you feel like garbage and the world is pretty shit at the moment  I know you probably feel like you are worthless  that you don t matter  That there is not a single living being on this earth that cares about or loves you  I swear to you there is  I care about and love you and wish you the best in your life  and I bet someone else out there does too  You might not have met them yet  but I promise you that they re there  waiting for you to come along Your life is worth living  Take it day by day  If you can t do that  take it hour by hour  Whatever you enjoy doing  That s worth living for  Have a pet  That s worth living for  Its one baby step at a time  love You will fall down and feel like you can t get back up  but I promise you that you can do it  Nothing in this life is impossible  You can do this  I love you
summary: There are people who care about and love you and wish you the best in your life. There is someone out there waiting for you to come along. Your life is worth living and you can do anything you want in this life.
cleaned: people care love wish good life wait come life worth live want life
